name: Puzzle Defence
description:
Puzzle Defence is a game made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam.

This game is a combination between a tower defense game and a item matching puzzle game.

In this game, you will place towers around the map to stop the enemies from getting through to the end of the map. Defeating enemies will give you more money to buy more towers. However, the only way to upgrade towers it to place them in specific layouts.

This game is in a playable state but still needs work in order to refine the experience. There is one map with 20 short waves to play through, but unfortunately there is no music or sound.

All the art and code was made during the jam and the pallette used is BLK Neo from Lospec, it was created by BlackedIRL.

This is the first game jam I have done and the first completed unity game I have made, I hope you enjoy the game and I hope you enjoy other games made during the Jam.

Enjoy =)

Note: Mac and Linux Versions have not been tested
